title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia     Â      Luminary ceremony along the Richmond-Lynchburg Stage Road near the McLean House during the 150th anniversary. NPS Staff  Use the Photo Gallery to take a pictorial visit of the buildings that make up the historic village of Appomattox Court House today. See how they look now, and see how some of them looked in 1865.  Use the Virtual Tour to take a 360 view of the buildings and grounds.
